subject: Re: Box's. Vintage Shortwave Panasonic am/fm radio with manual dial sweep

full_text:
You might try just tuning in a language you don't understand, announce 
you're doing an EVP recording, and record directly from the speaker for 
a couple minutes. Sometimes "they" will use the foreign language as the 
raw audio and make messages mixed in with it. 

 Frank-S
